title: Citi Mobile, Citibank Colombia's New Mobile Banking Service
summary: Bogota, Colombia - Citibank's strategy is to be the leading bank in financial digital media. With this goal in mind, in Colombia Citi has launched Citi Mobile, a new mobile banking service where customers can check their accounts, pay their bills and perform free-of-charge banking transactions. Citibank is the first bank in the country to offer this service via any type of mobile device and/or smartphone.
tag-1: Citi Mobile, Citibank Colombia's New Mobile Banking Service
tag-2: Bogota, Colombia – Citibank's strategy is to be the leading bank in financial digital media. With this goal in mind, in Colombia Citi has launched Citi Mobile, a new mobile banking service where customers can check their accounts, pay their bills and perform free-of-charge banking transactions. Citibank is the first bank in the country to offer this service via any type of mobile device and/or smartphone.
tag-3: Citi Mobile offers the opportunity, for the first time, for customers to make transfers between Citibank and other bank accounts without any fees, as well as checking accounts and products, payment for goods and services, payment of utilities bills and purchase of minutes.
tag-5: "With our 200-year anniversary this year, Citi has been an innovative bank focused on the development of technologies for financial and transactional services. Launching Citi Mobile in Colombia reflects not only the talent of our team, but also the commitment of the company and the franchise in Colombia to continue developing solutions to improve people's lives," said Colombia Citi Country Officer Bernardo Noreña.
tag-6: Citi Mobile is the newest part of a series of innovative projects that Citibank has been developing, with an emphasis on channels for customer services, supported by cutting-edge technology that allows the bank to be where the customer needs it to be.
tag-7: The network expansion strategy began in 2010, with17 new branches opened throughout the country since then and a network of 130 Citi Express modules launched nationwide.
tag-8: The Citi Mobile platform and details for its installation, activation and usage are available to all Citibank clients at www.citi.com.co or by calling CitiPhone at 6057000 in Bogota and 01 800 052 700 for the rest of the country.
tag-9: Citi Citi, the leading global bank, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management.
